Condition.name: Counterparty Accident Circumstances.Gravity is "Extremely Inculpatory"
Condition.expression:
Counterparty Accident Circumstances.Gravity|contains("Extremely Inculpatory")
/* list contains(Counterparty Accident Circumstances.Gravity,"Extremely Inculpatory")*/

Condition.name: Counterparty Accident Circumstances.Gravity contains "Inculpatory"
Condition.expression:
Counterparty Accident Circumstances.Gravity|contains("Inculpatory")
/* list contains(Counterparty Accident Circumstances.Gravity,"Inculpatory")*/

Condition.name: Counterparty Accident Circumstances.Gravity contains "Protecting"
Condition.expression:
Counterparty Accident Circumstances.Gravity|contains("Protecting")
/* list contains(Counterparty Accident Circumstances.Gravity,"Protecting") */
